item.title: Namibia Wildlife Resorts
item.description: Namibia Wildlife Resorts Namibia Wildlife Resorts

item.title: Ndakondja Uusiku: Founder and Chairperson
item.description: Ndakondja Uusiku: Founder and Chairperson Ndakondja Uusiku is a 19-year-old accounting student at the Namibia University of Science and Technology. Ndakondja awaits to graduate from the Olafika SME Development and Mentoring Program with an accredited certificate in SME Development.

item.title: First National Bank
item.description: First National Bank First National Bank

item.title: Jane Hango: Co-founder and Vice Chairperson
item.description: Jane Hango: Co-founder and Vice Chairperson Jane Hango is a 20-year-old Second Year Medical Student at UNAM Hage Geingob Campus, who is a proud product of Canisianum RCHS. She debated at national level for the Omusati region 2018.

item.title: Metropolitan Namibia
item.description: Metropolitan Namibia Metropolitan Namibia

item.title: Tuilika Andreas: Co-founder and Project Coordinator
item.description: Tuilika Andreas: Co-founder and Project Coordinator Tuilika Andreas is a second-year medical student at the University of Namibia. Apart from being an academic, she functions as an integral part of her society by being part of various organizations.

item.title: MTC Namibia
item.description: MTC NAmibia Make the connection

item.title: Paulina Hambata: Co-founder, Editor General and Public Relations Officer
item.description: Paulina Hambata: Co-founder, Editor General and Public Relations Officer Paulina Hambata is a 19-year-old 2nd Year Medical Student at UNAM Hage Geingob Campus. She has been ranked at national level in JSC and regionally for NSSCH examinations during her high school career.

item.title: Meat Corporation
item.description: Meat Corporation Meat Corporation

item.title: Otto Anna: Course coordinator
item.description: Otto Anna: Course coordinator Otto Anna is a 20-year-old Law Student at the University of Namibia (Unam). Anna is a young, in the making, motivational speaker who believes that all Black Children’s Dreams are possible.

item.title: Bongumenzi Khumalo aka BJ: Head of Accommodation
item.description: Bongumenzi Khumalo aka BJ: Head of Accommodation Bongumenzi Siphiwosami Khumalo is a 19-year-old Swazi citizen (liswati) doing his Second year in Bachelor of Medicine at the University of Namibia Hage Geingob Campus.

item.title: Ilotu Fix
item.description: Ilotu Fix Ilotu Fix

item.title: Nabot Tomas: Outdoor Coordinator
item.description: Nabot Tomas: Outdoor Coordinator Nabot Tomas is a 20-year-old second year student at the Medical school of Unam. He has been serving as a volunteer at Beautiful Kids Namibia since 2015 and is very passionate about working with the Youth.

item.title: Tunacor
item.description: Tunacor Tunacor

item.title: Magano Kafula: Outdoor Coordinator
item.description: Magano Kafula: Outdoor Coordinator Magano Kafula is a 20-year-old and second year Law student at the University of Namibia. She is currently the Communications Chairperson of Inspire Career Guidance, an organization which gives high school learners in the northern schools of Namibia information regarding university courses and bursary opportunities.

item.title: Old Mutual
item.description: Old Mutual Old Mutual

item.title: Ainley Amunyela: Culinary Guru
item.description: Ainley Amunyela: Culinary Guru Ainley Amunyela is currently a student at the University of Namibia’s HGC campus studying towards a Bachelor’s Degree in Medicine and Surgery. She is the President of the Medical Students’ Association of Namibia.

item.title: Prince Eelu: Course coordinator
item.description: Prince Eelu: Course coordinator Prince Eelu is a Bachelor of Entrepreneurship student at Namibia University of Science and Technology. Co-founder of Mindaway Investments and as well a Business Development Consultant and Quantum House, a diversified group that incorporates various SMEs.

item.title: About Us
item.description: The Origin Story The Purposeful Camp Namibia story starts with a ten minutes voice note that was send out at 3 AM that led to the fruition of the camp.

item.title: Mathews Kambuze: Head of Recreational activities
item.description: Mathews Kambuze: Head of Recreational activities Mathews Kambuze is a 21-year-old young man. He is a God-fearing fellow with strong biblical values. He an excellent public speaking trainer, MC & facilitator.
